LanguageData.Gun_Pistol.label: Пистолет
LanguageData.Gun_Pistol.description: Ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.
LanguageData.Bullet_PumpShotgun.label: Shotgun blast
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.label: Помповое ружье
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.description: Ancient design. Deadly, but short range.
LanguageData.Bullet_LeeEnfield.label: Rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_LeeEnfield.label: Ли-Энфилд
LanguageData.Gun_LeeEnfield.description: Ancient bolt-action rifle. Probably pulled from a basement somewhere. Good range, Good power, low rate of fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_M16Rifle.label: M-16 bullet
LanguageData.Gun_M16Rifle.label: М-16
LanguageData.Gun_M16Rifle.description: Ancient pattern military weapon. Three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_M24Rifle.label: M-24 bullet
LanguageData.Gun_M24Rifle.label: М-24
LanguageData.Gun_M24Rifle.description: Ancient pattern military sniper rifle. Bolt action. Long range, great accuracy and power.
LanguageData.Bullet_Uzi.label: Uzi bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Uzi.label: Узи
LanguageData.Gun_Uzi.description: Ancient pattern submachine gun. Short range, low power, high rate of fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_T9IncendiaryLauncher.label: T-9 Incendiary bolt
LanguageData.Gun_T9IncendiaryLauncher.label: T-9 Incendiary Launcher
LanguageData.Bullet_R4ChargeRifle.label: Charge shot
LanguageData.Gun_R4ChargeRifle.label: R-4 charge rifle
LanguageData.Bullet_L15LMG.label: L-15 bullet
LanguageData.Gun_L15LMG.label: L-15 пулемет
LanguageData.Bullet_Minigun.label: Minigun bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.label: Миниган
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.description: Not intended to be held and used by humans.
LanguageData.Bullet_TurretImprovised.label: Improvised turret bullet
LanguageData.Gun_TurretImprovised.label: Самодельная турель
LanguageData.Gun_TurretImprovised.description: Jury-rigged gun attached to a turret.
